name: Neon Edge
description:
WASD to move.  Left click to shoot.  Spacebar to swap places.  Escape to go back to the title screen.  Up and Down arrows to turn up or lower the volume.

The yellow and brown ducks mirror each other.  The yellow duck is always looking at your mouse and will mirror where the other duck is looking.

Also the game is still broken, if you swap places enemies just don't do anything so that's fun.

I went for the neon signs look but with how simple the art is it's hard to tell.

This was my first game jam with a part time job so I never had as much time as I'd like to work on it.  I ended up staying up really late so I could submit it this morning.
